title: digital x-ray
description: An X-ray from InHealth involves positioning the area of the body that is going to be examined between an X-ray device and a digital plate.

title: CT SCAN
description: Computed tomography (CT) scan is a useful diagnostic tool for detecting diseases and injuries. It uses a series of X-rays and a computer to produce a 3D image of soft tissues and bones. CT is a painless, noninvasive way for your healthcare provider to diagnose
